    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Simple circuits</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einfache Stromkreise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Circuits simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Circuitos simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Circuiti semplici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απλά κυκλώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Circuitos simples</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit diagram shows the direction of current in a simple circuit made up of a lamp, a switch and a cell.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lamp</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagrams</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit elements</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch cell</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Schaltplan zeigt die Richtung des Stromes 
in einem einfachen Stromkreis, der von einer Lampe, von einem Schalter
und von einer Zelle gebildet wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce schéma de circuit montre la direction du 
courant dans un circuit simple composé d'une lampe, d'un commutateur 
et d'une cellule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de circuito mostra o sentido da 
corrente em um circuito simples composto de uma lâmpada, de um 
interruptor e de uma pilha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema circuitale mostra il senso della 
corrente in un circuito semplice composto di una lampada, di un 
interruttore e di una cellula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων εμφανίζει την κατεύθυνση
του ρεύματος σε ένα απλό κύκλωμα φιαγμένο επάνω από λαμπτήρα, 
διακόπτη και κύτταρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este esquema circular muestra la dirección de la
corriente en un circuito simple compuesto de una lámpara, de un 
interruptor y de una célula.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lampe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schaltpläne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schaltkreiselemente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
